ap1EndDate.description: End date for the first Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances

ap2EndDate.description: End date for the second Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances, if applicable. If supplied must be after ap1EndDate

ap3EndDate.description: End date for the third Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances, if applicable. If supplied must be after ap2EndDate

disallowanceAp1.description: Amount for the first Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances, must be supplied if ap1EndDate is supplied

disallowanceAp2.description: Amount for the second Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances, must be supplied if ap2EndDate is supplied

disallowanceAp3.description: Amount for the third Accounting Period apportioned dissallowances, must be supplied if ap3EndDate is supplied

totalDisallowances.description: Total of disallowanceAp1, disallowanceAp2 and disallowanceAp3
